00102   int getCountRegister() {
00103     //Like that this class can be savely used for the 767 only database entries (<year 2010)
00104     if(obj()->getNInt() < kBmlCaenConfInterruptRegister+2) return 0;
00105     return getIntVal(kBmlCaenConfInterruptRegister);
00106   }

00114   int getSpare() {
00115     //Like that this class can be savely used for the 767 only database entries (<year 2010)
00116     if(obj()->getNInt() < kBmlCaenConfInterruptRegister+2) return 0;
00117     return getIntVal(kBmlCaenConfSpare);
00118   }

00122   void print(  std::ostream& os) {
00123     os << "BmlCaenConfigurationData: " << std::hex << std::endl;
00124     os << "BoardID: " << BoardID(getBoardID()) << std::endl;
00125     os << "Base Address: " << getBaseAddress() << std::endl;
00126     os << "Record Label: " << getRecordLabel() << std::endl;
00127     os << "Control Register: " <<  getControlRegister() << std::endl;
00128     os << "Interrupt Register: " << getInterruptRegister() << std::endl;
00129     os << "Count Register: " << getCountRegister() << std::endl;
00130     os << "Spare: " << getSpare() << std::dec << std::endl;

00132   };
